content: the striped amethyst scarf this beginners pattern is for an extra-long scarf i used two different colors of bernat premium yarn in purple and soft grey heather i also used a larger hook because i wanted it to have a looser feeling to the scarf for this pattern you will need any 4 worsted weight yarn 6 0 mm hook 10/j this is an original pattern and has been tested please do not copy/recreate sell or use the pattern for teaching purposes however you can sell the finished product please give pattern credit to me https //www instagram com/fybreandfleece/ https //www facebook com/fybreandfleece/ if you have any questions feel free to contact me
